overview: Max van den Berg is VP of Sales and Marketing at Qelp, and is responsible for global sales and marketing at Qelp. Prior to joining Qelp, he was Managing Director of Sony Ericsson Benelux, where he was the driving force behind the growth of the Sony Ericsson mobile phone business in The Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg. He has deep knowledge of the distribution dynamics in consumer electronics, IT and telecommunications industries on an international level.
